text: Villa Biscossi is a comune in the Province of Pavia in the Lombardy region in Italy. It is about 50 km southwest of Milan and about 30 km southwest of Pavia. As of 31 December 2004, 74 people lived there. It has an area of 5 kmÂ².All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Villa Biscossi is next to these municipalities: Galliavola, Lomello, Mede, Pieve del Cairo. == Demographic change == Colors= id:lightgrey value:gray(0.9) id:darkgrey value:gray(0.8) id:sfondo
